java/liquibase/preconditions/PreconditionFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import java.util.HashMap;
00004 import java.util.Map;
00005 
00006 public class PreconditionFactory {
00007     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00008     private final Map<String, Class> tagToClassMap;
00009 
00010     private static final PreconditionFactory instance = new PreconditionFactory();
00011 
00012     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00013     private PreconditionFactory() {
00014         tagToClassMap = new HashMap<String, Class>();
00015         Class[] preconditions = new Class[]{
00016                 AndPrecondition.class,
00017                 OrPrecondition.class,
00018                 NotPrecondition.class,
00019                 DBMSPrecondition.class,
00020                 RunningAsPrecondition.class,
00021                 ChangeSetExecutedPrecondition.class,
00022                 TableExistsPrecondition.class,
00023                 ColumnExistsPrecondition.class,
00024                 SequenceExistsPrecondition.class,
00025                 ForeignKeyExistsPrecondition.class,
00026                 IndexExistsPrecondition.class,
00027                 PrimaryKeyExistsPrecondition.class,
00028                 ViewExistsPrecondition.class,
00029                 SqlPrecondition.class,
00030                 CustomPreconditionWrapper.class,
00031         };
00032 
00033         try {
00034             for (Class<Precondition> preconditionClass : preconditions) {
00035                 Precondition precondition = preconditionClass.newInstance();
00036                 tagToClassMap.put(precondition.getTagName(), preconditionClass);
00037             }
00038         } catch (Exception e) {
00039             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00040         }
00041     }
00042 
00043     public static PreconditionFactory getInstance() {
00044         return instance;
00045     }
00046 
00050     public Precondition create(String tagName) {
00051         Class<?> aClass = tagToClassMap.get(tagName);
00052         if (aClass == null) {
00053             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown tag: " + tagName);
00054         }
00055         try {
00056             return (Precondition) aClass.newInstance();
00057         } catch (Exception e) {
00058             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00059         }
00060     }
00061 }
